short_summary: Request for Standing Offer for aggregates products
description: Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) for acquisition of aggregates products and delivery for 4 sectors located in Quebec
duration_in_months: It is estimated that this contract will last for about 8 months
full_summary:
### E6MON-230006 - Standing Offer for Aggregates Products
#### Reference Number: WS3723057358-Doc3950913690
#### Solicitation Number: WS3723057358
#### Tender Closing Date: April 26, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Federal Departments and Agencies is issuing this Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) for the acquisition of aggregates products, including delivery, for four (4) sectors located in Quebec.

#### Tender Description:
The bidder will be required to submit supporting documentation and their bid, at the latest by the tender closing date and time. Bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT on April 26, 2023, will be considered non-responsive. The scope of the aggregate products includes:

* Aggregates products, including delivery, for four (4) sectors located in Quebec

#### Trade Agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

#### Regions of Opportunity:
None

#### Regions of Delivery:
* Quebec, Canada
* Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines, Quebec, Canada
* Montreal, Quebec, Canada
* Farnham, Quebec, Canada
* Longueuil, Quebec, Canada
* Donnacona, Quebec, Canada
* Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Quebec, Canada

#### Contracting Entity Information:
* Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Name: Annie Blanchet (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: [annie.blanchet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:annie.blanchet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

For further information, please visit the public procurement notice on Ariba at http://discovery
